title: Daggers
content:
another type of Damage as well.

Many Daggers have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Daggers in BG3. These Weapon Actions include Piercing Strike, Lacerate, and Flourish.

Battleaxes Clubs Daggers Darts Flails Glaives Greataxes Greatclubs Greatswords Halberds Handaxes Hand Crossbows Heavy Crossbows Javelins Light Crossbows Light Hammers Longbows Longswords Maces Mauls Morningstars Pik
